document_data.name: Evermelt
document_data.mainbody: The '''Evermelt''' was a subterranean hot spring found within a cave at the base of the [[Reghed Glacier]]. It was considered a holy place by the [[Reghedmen]] [[barbarian]]s of nearby [[Icewind Dale]].
document_data.Geographical Features:
The warm, tranquil waters of Evermelt appeared as a serene turquoise color that glittered like [[gold]].

Despite its mostly still waters, Evermelt had a small undercurrent that could pull individuals beneath the surface.
document_data.Inhabitants: As of the {{YearlinkName|1485}}, the spring was guarded by members of the [[Tribe of the Bear]], at the behest of the Ice Witch [[Hedrun Arnsfirth]].
